title: Should urf be a permanent game mode
body:
I have played this game for a very long time and i can honestly say that the saddest day in this games history, for me, is going to come soon. 
URF isn't going to be gracing my match history this april 1st because rito decided that they hated their players. Now i know that they enjoy the thought of this rotating game mode and if you are going to use that to test new ideas, then it's great. The problem is that a huge percentage of the league of legends community loved this specific game type as much or more than they love aram. 
So if you guys could give me your opinions on this and if we could get a rito employee to inform us on if this could be possible then lets do it

replies.body: It needs massive work before it would be viable for permanent addition.
if it is it will no longer be urf

people commenting negatively because they didnt like snowdown arurf. its normal, that was a fail. what we want, is URF, with the heal nerf and traps (shaco teemo) nerf. Just URF. people are trying to discredit by saying it makes people leave the game but its false. we leave because urf is better than LOL and why would we lose time of our life playing our number 2 game. well find another number 1. for years now ive been msging riot, signing petitions and checking the forum to have it. i said numerous times that im willing to pay. monthly fees if its needed. idc, its just the best game ever. lol is too slow for me. i wont lose my life time like that.

The reason Urf is enjoyable is because we don't have it all the time.

It gets old fast.

Urf is nice, but i feel my hands fall off after a few days of urf. But to be honest they really need to make rotating modes much more often, my favorite is one for all, but i have no idea how many years ago i last played it, maybe it was on at some point, but i missed it I guess. Also liked the one where you pick for enemy, it always ended in 5 supports running around, it was hillariuos.

Riot said that URF was so good, that when people binged it for a month, they wouldn't wanna play norms for a while anymore 

I miss 2014, damn
"huge percentage" by huge you mean a really small fraction of people? urf is one of those modes that rapidly lose population just a few days after it's available
Yes, permanent game mode in customs then Let it never be touched again. Urfs so bleh after a day then the most Broken champs are clear and no one does anything else.
